snippet: The Shabab, the Qaeda-linked militant network in Somalia, confirmed that its leader, Ahmed Abdi Godane, had been killed in an American airstrike.
abstract: Shabab, Qaeda-linked militant network in Somalia, confirms that its leader Ahmed Abdi Godane has been killed in an American airstrike, and identifies its new leader as Sheikh Ahmad Umar Abu Ubaidah.
lead_paragraph: The Shabab, the Qaeda-linked militant network in Somalia, confirmed that its leader, Ahmed Abdi Godane, had been killed in an American airstrike.

headline.main: Somali Militants Confirm Leader’s Death in U.S. Strike
headline.print_headline: Somali Militants Confirm Leader’s Death in U.S. Strike

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
